alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Mitchell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 10:18PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mitchell, northwestern Colquitt and southwestern Worth Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1018 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Baconton, or 7 miles northeast of Camilla, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baconton, Doerun, Sale City, Bridgeboro, Minton, Gordy, Flint, Livingston, Anderson City, Ticknor, Minnesota, Parkerville, Laney, Lester, Pritchetts, Freeman, Poplar Arbor Church, New Elm, Greenough and Alfords. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia.
